title: Original Sin
author: P.D. James

quote_last: , ten minutes late, but the children, Jimmy and Bitsy, are still eating supper and their parents are not ready to go yet. From other rooms come the sound of a baby screaming, water running, a television musical (no words: probably a dance number - patterns of gliding figures come to mind).
title: The Babysitter
author: Robert Coover
